channel.title: Moparscape coding
channel.description:
I need help on how to make admins and mods... And In the emote thing the Bank tab how to I make that access your bank?
OMG TY SOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO MUCH And how do I make commands? like ::pkbox or something?

item.title: Moparscape coding
item.dc:creator: @veki94 veki94
item.description:
@veki94 wrote:

To make admins go in -> characters-> go in the player who want to be admin\mod --> find the line character rights its normally 0 if u want mod change to 1 ,for admin change to 2 and for owner 3
veki

Read full topic

item.title: Moparscape coding
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Firstly to make admins and mods, go to characters, find their name… Then change their character rights to, 0 for normal player
1 for Moderator
2 for Administrator
3 for Owner or Co-owner
4+ for Hidden Owner/admin…

As for the bank emote… Firstly, find, bank… And it should bring you to our emotes, before
break;
add
OpenUpBank();
… Happy to help

Read full topic
